svg.script: function setMatrixForElem(id, matrix) { var elem = document.getElementById(id); elem.setAttribute("transform", "matrix("+matrix+")"); } function go() { // This moves image1 completely offscreen setMatrixForElem("image1", "0.5 -1 0 1 0 -30"); // This flattens image2 to take up 0 space setMatrixForElem("image2", "1 0 0 0 0 0"); // NOTE: The third image should be unaffected by the above // and should still render. document.documentElement.removeAttribute('class'); }
